# Charms WASM Module

This directory contains the Charms WASM library for extracting and verifying spells.

## Setup

Run the setup script from the `client/` directory:

```bash
cd client
./scripts/setup-charms-wasm.sh
```

Or manually:

```bash
# Download WASM binary
curl -L -o public/wasm/charms_lib.wasm \
  https://github.com/CharmsDev/charms/releases/download/v0.10.0/charms_lib.wasm

# Generate JS bindings (requires wasm-bindgen-cli)
wasm-bindgen --out-dir public/wasm --target web public/wasm/charms_lib.wasm
```

## Generated Files

After setup, this directory will contain:
- `charms_lib.wasm` - The WASM binary
- `charms_lib.js` - JavaScript glue code
- `charms_lib_bg.wasm` - Background WASM (generated by wasm-bindgen)

These files are gitignored since they can be regenerated.
